QuestData.Title: Grimtusk's Sister
QuestData.Description:
Last is my sister, Naluki. She helps run the inn at Iskaara now.
Just give her this letter.
Don't open it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Grimtusk's letter to his sister, Naluki, in Iskaara.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver Grimtusk's letter to his sister Naluki in Iskaara.
QuestData.RewardText:
Why, well aren't you just a fresh fish hopping out of the water!
What's this? A letter from Grimtusk?
